summary: This is an email from attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim transmitting a courtesy copy of a court filing (ECF filing) dated August 18, 2021, related to victims (VICs). It includes a confidentiality notice and updated contact information for her law office.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: She is the sender of the email, transmitting a courtesy copy of a court filing related to victims. She identifies herself as an attorney with her own law office.

events.title: Court Filing Submission
events.description: An ECF (Electronic Case Filing) was submitted to the court, referenced in the attached document 'Letter re VICs 8-18-18.pdf'.

keyFacts: Attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim sent an email on August 18, 2021, transmitting a court filing.
The attached filing is titled 'Letter re VICs 8-18-18.pdf', indicating it concerns victims (VICs).
The email includes a standard confidentiality and privilege notice for legal correspondence.
The document shows Sternheim updating her office address and preferred email contact information.
